53  template<class ObjectType = Object>
54  ObjectType& GetCollisionSubject(const Direction& direction, int index) {
55  if (Collides(direction)) {
56  for (auto subject : _collisions[direction]) {
57  if (subject != nullptr
58  && dynamic_cast<ObjectType*>(subject)
59  && subject->GetIndex() == index) {
60  return dynamic_cast<ObjectType&>(*subject);
61  }
62  }
63  }
64  throw CollisionComponentException("Tried getting non-existent collision subject");
65  };
66  template<class ObjectType = Object>
67  std::vector<std::reference_wrapper<ObjectType>> GetCollisionSubjects(const Direction& direction) {
68  std::vector<std::reference_wrapper<ObjectType>> subjects;
69  for (auto subject : _collisions[direction]) {
70  if (dynamic_cast<ObjectType*>(subject))
71  subjects.push_back(dynamic_cast<ObjectType&>(*subject));
72  }
73  return subjects;
74  };

102  };

104  template<class ObjectType>
105  inline bool CollisionComponent::Collides(const Direction& direction) noexcept
106  {
107  for (auto collision : _collisions[direction]) {
108  if (dynamic_cast<ObjectType*>(collision)) {
109  return true;
110  }
111  }
112  return false;
113  }
